extendedInfo.description: CommunityAmerica Credit Union is about convenience for our members. After all, you own the place. And itâs your money, so access to it should be on your terms. Thatâs why weâve developed our mobile banking app. Weâve even loaded it up with some cool utilities and calculators. And thereâs one other very big thing: itâs secure. Thatâs important to you. Itâs important to us at CACU. Check out the techie speak below to put your mind at ease. So, using your Android device, you can bank with us wherever and whenever you want.What are you waiting for? Join in. FEATURESâ¢See account summary informationâ¢View details on account activityâ¢Transfer funds between accountsâ¢Find the nearest CommunityAmerica ATM or Branch â or one of the over 28,000 surcharge-free ATMs and 4,300 âsharedâ branches if itâs more convenientâ¢Quickly find contact information for CommunityAmericaâ¢Calculate mortgage, consumer loan, and tip informationâ¢Quick access to CommunityAmerica Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube sitesâ¢Security: multi-factor authentication, 128-bit encryption, secure socket layer (SSL), no personal information stored on phones.*Access to account information via the app is only available to members who have online banking access. If youâre a member and need account access, go to cacu.com to sign up for online banking. If you are not a member, feel free to download the app and call or visit your nearest branch to Join In.Federally insured by NCUA.CommunityAmerica Credit Union makes loans without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, sex, handicap, or familial status

reviews.title: Where is mobile deposit
reviews.comment: Actual CACU branches are pretty far scattered throughout the city. App is good for the basics but really want remote deposit.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Galaxy S 3
reviews.comment: Love CACU! Like the app. I wish there were more options. Like being able to look thru the diff services CACU offers or interest rates on accts and loans and stuff like that.
reviews.author: Misty Guilfoil

reviews.title: Freeze
reviews.comment: In the past week it has been freezing and keeps saying time out and wont let me log in.
reviews.author: Kathleen Scherer

reviews.title: Meh...
reviews.comment: Glad for the app, but it\'s in need of some seeeerious polish. Would like ability to take a snapshot of a check to deposit it like Citi.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: CA is a great CU but behind on tech
reviews.comment: Please add the ability to deposit checks by taking a picture of the check with the app. Also being able to use bill pay from the app would be cool. Please see the Sallie Mae Bank mobile app for a reference in good financial institution app design. Thanks.
reviews.author: Justin Wilson

reviews.title: Needs updated to be more stable with newer versions of is.
reviews.comment: Nexus 7, 2013 Worked well on 2.3 devices, but freezes, unresponsive at times with 4.0, 4.1, ... Can log in and see balances, but cannot open account to see transactions. Shut down tablet and restart sometimes clears problem.
reviews.author: Mike Kirkpatrick

reviews.title: Needs bill pay
reviews.comment: Great app would be even better if it had bill pay.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good job, CA
reviews.comment: Its a tad slow, but considering encryption, security, etc it runs just fine. Decent features, easy to use and just paranoid enuf... It has clearly identified my home area to a pretty solid radius but asks security questions outside of that. The only problem I have is pretty general and that\'s the pending balance doest show on the accounts list. Its trickin you into thinking there\'s more money in there.
reviews.author: chip siskey

reviews.title: Working
reviews.comment: Don\'t know why but it randomly quit working for me
reviews.author: Alex Villanueva

reviews.title: It\'s good.
reviews.comment: I like the transfer feature. But the ability to deposit a check via pictures would be wonderful.
reviews.author: Tyler Scheib

reviews.title: Love CACU, hate the app
reviews.comment: Over the last several years, I\'ve used mobile banking from 6 different financial institutions; this is, by far, the worst I\'ve encountered.
reviews.author: Madeline Edwards

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Note 2
reviews.comment: Not much different from the mobile web site, really need to add the ability to make checking deposits to make it really useful.
reviews.author: Billy McClinton

reviews.comment: App works great for checking balance
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Same as website
reviews.comment: The app is too Web based. It\'s exactly the same as the mobile site for it. What you need is a native Android app that actually works with Android, not pulls from the Web.
reviews.author: Tyler Eggleston

reviews.title: Basic Functionality. Poor Overall App Experience.
reviews.comment: Pros: Log in. See Account details. Transfer Funds.  Cons: iPhone UI clone. Still fundamentally web-based resulting in slow responses to inputs.   This app is in need of a complete overhaul with native Android components and following ICS design guidelines.
reviews.author: Ben Napper

reviews.title: HTC One S
reviews.comment: Awesome I use this all the time.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sean
reviews.comment: Would be nice if it had bill pay.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: What\'s happened?
reviews.comment: Will let me log in but cannot open checking or savings account to see what my transactions are. Would like to see online deposits as well.
reviews.author: Gary Ferguson

reviews.title: Great app,  Need app for Tablets!!!
reviews.comment: Need to come out with app for tablets!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Great app. Just wish it had a way to know it was loading.. Like a status bar or something.
reviews.author: A Google User
